## MandeInstance.delete() method

Sends a DELETE request to the given url.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
delete(url: string | number, options: Options<'response'>): Promise<Response>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string \| number | relative url to send the request to |
|  options | [Options](./mande.options.md)<!-- -->&lt;'response'&gt; | optional [Options](./mande.options.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Response&gt;

## Example


```js
users.delete('2').then(user => {
  // do something
})
```
